thread.title_full: Apartment in excellent location with great views, For Sale in La Sabana -The Tico Times

author: Mariana
title: Apartment in excellent location with great views, For Sale in La Sabana
text:
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507163149.jpeg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507163000.jpeg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507162755.jpeg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507162831.jpeg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507162655.jpeg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/29-7-img20150507162813.jpeg
Price: $430,000 Province: San José
Cantón: San José
Construction: 189m2
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 3
Parking: 2
A/C: Yes
Located in privileged location of San José in front of La Sabana Park. This apartment on a high floor offers great views of the park and the city. Exclusive building with concierge service and underground parking.
The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a master with a large walk-in closet, 3.5 bathrooms, very spacious living/dining area, an open kitchen and laundry room. Distributed from north to south on the tower, it offers great views for both sides.
Very close to downtown San José and there is easy access to all the main highways.
See this and other listings in the new Tico Times Real Estate section here.
COD: 29-7
Email: realestate@ticotimes.net
Phone: +(506) 2258-1558
